Package ch.ethz.vizzly.performance

This package contains the implementation of a performance tracker that writes collected performance data asynchronously to a SQL database.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractPerformanceTracker
    This abstract class defines the interfaces of a performance tracker.
    DataFetchPerformanceMeasurement
    This class implements a data type that represents the measurement of the time needed to fetch data from a data source.
    DbPerformanceTracker
    This class collects performance measurements that are taken during cache accesses.
    DbPerformanceTrackerPersistenceThread
    This thread periodically copies performance measurements from the memory to a MySQL database
    DummyPerformanceTracker
    This class defines a dummy performance tracker that can be used instead of the DbPerformanceTracker when no MySQL database is involved.
    UserRequestPerformanceMeasurement
    This class implements a data type that represents an end-to-end measurement of the overall time needed for serving a request.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    DataFetchPerformanceMeasurement.DataBackend  

Package ch.ethz.vizzly.performance Description

This package contains the implementation of a performance tracker that writes collected performance data asynchronously to a SQL database.
